title: Mailbox Peak
description: A strenuous day hike with 4,100 feet of elevation gain. The original path heads straight up the ridge through the forest to the rocky summit for a 6-miles round trip. The new trail switchbacks to the summit for 11.2 miles round trip.

title: Mount Si
description: A strenuous day hike with 4,100 feet of elevation gain. The original path heads straight up the ridge through the forest to the rocky summit for a 6-miles round trip. The new trail switchbacks to the summit for 11.2 miles round trip.
